resources.string: "*FAIRTIQ-Tickets are valid within the whole Verkehrsverbund Vorarlberg and for the combi tariff with Liechtenstein (VVV-LIEmobil) with the following limitations: ‚Ä¢ FAIRTIQ-Tickets are only valid in 2nd class in √ñBB trains ‚Ä¢ FAIRTIQ-Tickets are not valid in combi tariff with Ostwind (VVV-OTV)"
Are you a transportation company interested to find out if FAIRTIQ works in your area? We look forward to hearing from you at b2b@fairtiq.com.

FAIRTIQ is an innovative, dynamic start-up striving to make traveling by public transport easier than ever before. In line with our vision \"the easiest way to everyday mobility, for everyone, everywhere\", we have been simplifying sustainable mobility together with transport companies since 2016.
If you would like to promote employee mobility or are looking for a business solution, please contact us at b2b@fairtiq.com.
Do you have any questions, suggestions or ideas for improving the app? We would be delighted to hear from you at feedback@fairtiq.com.
I have read and taken note of the data protection declaration
I agree to the general terms and conditions
Your changes will not be saved.
Notify me when I am close to getting a bonus
Your email will be used for receiving payment receipts, FAIRTIQ offers and relevant communication. You can always unsubscribe for free via the email footer or by email to %s.
Your age is automatically taken into account when calculating the price of your ticket. In case of a control, you might be asked to show an official document mentioning your age.
Notify me when I get a bonus
I agree to waive my right of withdrawal
Add an accepted payment method in this region or select a different profile
Important: You will receive a separate receipt per payment profile.
You have already left the promotion.
Do you have a Half-fare travel card? If so, please add it now to ensure you get a reduced fare.
This app has been switched to Background Restriction mode. We recommend turning it off to allow us to compute your journey correctly.
This function, though useful, prevents FAIRTIQ from working properly.
You are using a battery saver.
Please check your payment methods to be able to travel again.
Travel 5 days and get a credit of %d.
By travelling with FAIRTIQ on at least 5 days during a calendar month you become eligible to be credited 5% of the ticket price charged for these journeys.

"The credit is valid one month and is automatically applied to your next invoice after being issued. You will only be credited for journeys made within one of the participating communities listed below:"
Where and how does it apply?
Notify me when I get a bonus
Notify me when I am close to getting a bonus
The active payment profile cannot be changed as long as a journey is ongoing.
"Don't worry. You can continue travelling by either choosing another profile, adding a new payment method or changing your travel region."
"Don't worry. You can continue travelling by either choosing another profile or adding a new payment method."
Oh no! This profile is unavailable in this region
Further information is needed in order to travel in this region
"Don't worry. You can continue travelling by adding a new one or choosing another profile."
No payment methods linked to this profile
"Don't worry. You can continue travelling by adding a new one or changing your travel region."
Don‚Äôt worry. You can continue travelling by adding a new one.
Oh no! Your payment methods are unavailable in this region
We were unable to charge your past journeys. Please make sure you provide a valid payment method.
Uh oh! We couldn‚Äôt settle one or more invoices
We use your location to search for nearby stations and calculate your journey correctly. We will only use your location while you are travelling with us
Please fill up your missing user data in the Account Settings
FAIRTIQ does not have sufficient permissions to access your location data. You will have to grant this access from the system settings in order to use FAIRTIQ. Please set to \"Always\".
FAIRTIQ cannot locate you, your journey will be terminated automatically.
"Don't worry. You can continue travelling by adding a new one."
Oh no! Your payment methods are unavailable in this region

We were unable to charge your past journeys. Please make sure you provide a valid payment method.
Uh oh! We couldn‚Äôt settle one or more invoices

Unknown station, bus or tram stop
There‚Äôs not enough available storage on your device to start a new journey. You can free up storage in your Settings.
Ready to start journey with Smart Stop
Journey in progress with Smart Stop
"Hope you had a good one. We will notify you as soon as your journey has been finalized."
Waiting for journey price to be computed
"The validity is the same as the one of the GA travelcard but with the following limitations: ‚Ä¢ FAIRTIQ tickets are not yet valid on boats ‚Ä¢ Night supplements must be bought separately"
Choose the region for which you want to see the available passes and cards.
Choose the region for which you want to add a payment method. The range of payment methods usable for travel varies by region.
Enter up to 3 pre-purchased travel passes or cards. They will be taken into account when determining the price of your journeys.
You can bring your saved companions with you on your next trip, by selecting them directly from the start screen before starting your journey.
You cannot edit this companion while travelling with them.
These are the companions who will be travelling with you.
You reached the maximum number of companions you can travel with
Could not reach FAIRTIQ. Please check your network connection.
Please enter all details. We will answer you as soon as possible.
You don‚Äôt have any credit yet.
We are sorry! Something went wrong and we are working on it. Please try again later.
Your default region for travelling is missing.
An error occurred while saving your payment method
"No or an outdated version of TWINT is installed on this device. Please update or install the TWINT app."

"Thank you for using our product. We will let you know on the outcome of your request by SMS or email.
You will be logged off your account."
Your account deletion request has been submitted

"Deleting your account will notify our customer care agents, who will review your request and get in touch with you by email or SMS.
Do you wish to proceed with the deletion of your account?"
This action cannot be revoked. You will still be able to review journeys performed with this companion.
Are you sure you want to delete your companion?
Do you want to delete this card?
Do you want to delete the SwissPass?
You will have to show your SwissPass at ticket inspection.

We are committed to continuously improve our service for you. Please take note of our updated data protection declaration to inform yourself about how we process and store your personal information. You can review this summary of changes to know more.
Our general terms and conditions and data protection declaration have been updated

We are committed to continuously improve our service for you. Please take note of our updated data protection declaration to inform yourself about how we process and store your personal information. To continue travelling with us, please accept the updated terms and conditions with the switch below. You can review this summary of changes to know more.
Our general terms and conditions have been updated

We are committed to continuously improve our service for you. To continue travelling with us, we ask you to please review and accept our updated terms and conditions with the switch below. You can review this summary of changes to know more.

Activate to edit your personal details or your ticket settings.
The email format is invalid (correct format is name@example.com)
You will not be able to use FAIRTIQ until you update your app.
To join the experiment, enter the experiment code ending with 2-digit you received from your public transportation company (format of the code: XXXXXXXX18).
This experiment is inactive. You can leave it to join another one.
It is not possible to start a journey when the experiment is inactive.
Please end your journey before leaving FAIRTIQ Lab.
You will need your experiment activation code to register again.
Are you sure you want to leave FAIRTIQ Lab?

Thank you for travelling with FAIRTIQ!
Poor network detected. Please check your connection.

"The finalisation of your journey takes longer than usual. You can find it in your journey history later."
No accurate position available, please make sure you are outside.

"We are unable to retrieve your journey summary at the moment. You can find it in your journey history later."

Please activate your \"Motion & Fitness\" settings to ensure that we can warn you when to stop your journey.
Our Check-out Reminder just got smarter. Curious?
Report an issue with this journey
We are sorry! Something went wrong and we are working on it. Please try again later.
Did we compute your journey correctly?
What issue is there with this journey?
We use your location to search for nearby stations and calculate your journey correctly. We will only use your location while you are traveling with us.
We need permission to access your location in order to be able to evaluate your journeys.
Help us to know where you are
Your FAIRTIQ account will be unlocked as soon as the payment is debited.

"FAIRTIQ is the easiest public transport ticket there is. Spread the word and share your personal promocode with your friends! They'll get up to %s off their first FAIRTIQ trip. Once they've made their trip, we‚Äôll automatically give you the same travel credit as well. Pass the code on as many times as you like. üòâ"

"Share your referral code with your friends.
When one of your friends redeems the code before their first trip they will get up to %s 3 off.
Once they make their first trip, you will get %s 3 which will be deducted from your next journey (valid 90 days).
You can share your code with an unlimited number of friends."
Want to get a free ride?
By allowing access to physical activity data, FAIRTIQ can detect the end of your journey and send you a reminder to stop it.
Access to your device camera is used to fill you credit card data.
We need permission to access your location in order to determine your journey with FAIRTIQ.
Select \"Allow While In Use\" in order for FAIRTIQ to be able to determine your journey and provide you with a valid ticket. Your location is only tracked during a journey initiated by you.
We need permission to access your Motion and Fitness Data to remind you to stop your journey.
Provide access to your photo library to choose a picture of your credit card to be scanned.
To travel in the current region please add a payment method available in this region.

You didn‚Äôt authorize FAIRTIQ to access your location. Without this permission the app won‚Äôt be able to calculate your journeys correctly. You can go to settings and change permissions to ‚ÄúAlways‚Äù.
"This journey with FTQ Lab doesn't include a valid ticket."
To add a payment method and use FAIRTIQ please enable this feature in your device settings.
Your location must be available in high accuracy mode.
Do you want to stop your journey?
Your inquiry could not be sent. Please, try again later.
Thank you for your inquiry. We will get back to you shortly.
Notifications need to be enabled to allow FAIRTIQ to inform you about the status of your journey and to remind you to end it after you left the vehicle.
"Enter the verification code sent to this mobile number. If you don't get it or didn't enter the right number, please go back."
"Update FAIRTIQ, your version won't be supported anymore soon."
A new version of FAIRTIQ is available
Visit the app store to update

Looking for environmentally friendly mobility in W√ºrzburg? We can help you with that. Under the APG brand, the municipal enterprise of the district of W√ºrzburg (KU) operates scheduled bus services in the district of W√ºrzburg. No matter whether you are going to school, to work, out shopping or you just want to travel in your leisure time: with us you will always reach your destination safely! We plan the timetable schedules and the route network in the district of W√ºrzburg and participate as an active partner in the transport association VVM. At the same time, we develop our own services and thus ensure an attractive public transport offer.

The tariff community A-Welle comprises the majority of the canton of Aargau as well as the eastern part of the canton of Solothurn with the centres Aarau, Olten, and Baden. Nine transport companies are part of the tariff community.
Through FAIRTIQ you can obtain discounted single tickets for bus travel in the city of Flensburg.
The four lines of the Bus Sierrois operate in the city and the surrounding villages.

"The Verkehrsverbund Mittelth√ºringen (VMT) is an association of fifteen transport companies, four independent cities, three districts and one special-purpose association in the Free State of Thuringia. In the area covered by the association, passengers can travel by bus, train and tram with one ticket. The partners are the independent cities and districts: Erfurt, Weimar, Jena, Gera, Gotha district, Weimarer Land district, Saale-Holzland district, Saalfeld-Rudolstadt and Saale-Orla district."

nus colliains - we connect! Engadin Mobil is the integrated tariff communitiy of the upper Engadin. The four participating transportation companies connect stations between Maloja and Cinuos-chel and from Spinas to Alp Gr√ºm.

Frimobil is the tariff community in and around the city of Fribourg. The territory comprises 56 zones and includes the canton of Fribourg and the region \"Broye\" in the canton of Vaud. Six transportation companies are connected to the network.

The G√∂ttinger Verkehrsbetriebe GmbH (G√∂VB) operates public transport with buses in the city of G√∂ttingen and to Bovenden and Rosdorf. Approx. 22 million passengers are transported on the G√∂VB lines every year. The FAIRTIQ app introduces a new electronic fare (airline fare) with automatic fare calculation. Further information at luftlinientarif.de

"The Hallesche Verkehrs-AG (HAVAG) carries more than 55 million passengers annually to their destination with its trams and buses in the city of Halle (Saale) and on the Halle ‚Äî Bad D√ºrrenberg route. Thanks to FAIRTIQ, buying tickets in tariff zone 210 (Halle) is now easier than ever.
By the way: An interactive city map, free WLAN and all news and events from Halle (Saale) can be found in the app \"Mein HALLE\" www.swh.de/meinhalle."

In a joint pilot project of the city of Ingelheim, the Rhein-Nahe-Nahverkehrsverbund GmbH and INGmobil GmbH, single tickets for all connections within the city of Ingelheim are conveniently offered via FAIRTIQ. The FAIRTIQ app is not only valid for the free journeys offered by the city of Ingelheim at certain times, but can be used to purchase all single tickets in zone Ingelheim (320, except Gau-Algesheim). For more information, please see the FAQs.

The K√∂lner Verkehrs-Betriebe (KVB) serves around 290 million passengers annually with 12 train and 69 bus lines. Since December 2021, KVB has enabled borderless travel within the entire state of NRW with all means of local transport (bus, tram, RE and RB as well as S-Bahn lines).

The Karlsruher Verkehrsverbund (KVV) is the third largest transport association in Baden-W√ºrttemberg and, with 20 transport companies, the most important mobility service provider on the Upper Rhine. The hallmark of the KVV is an efficient network with an internationally renowned light rail system that connects the region with Karlsruhe city centre without changing trains. Every year, around 170 million passengers use the attractive local transport services.

The tariff community Libero is one of the biggest in Switzerland in geografical terms. Its territory is split into 91 zones. It includes the regions Bern-Solothurn-Biel. The 16 transportation companies connected to the network operate more than 100 points of sale.
As a transport company, LINZ AG LINIEN is part of daily life in the greater Linz area. Every day, more than 300,000 passengers use public transport to get to their destination safely and comfortably.

Transport association marego coordinates and shapes local public transport for the Magdeburg region. Together with its shareholders - eight transport companies from Magdeburg and the districts of B√∂rde, Jerichower Land and Salzlandkreis - the transport association ensures that passengers reach their destinations easily. The transport association offers a coordinated and comprehensive range of fares with a high level of transport quality and uniform transport conditions. As the interface between passengers, shareholders, and political authorities, marego lays the foundation for attractive and reliable public transport in the Magdeburg region.

Mobilis is the tariff community allowing people to travel in the canton of Vaud - originally launched in Lausanne it grew to currently cover almost the entire canton. The services in the 130 tariff zones it comprises are provided by 13 partnering transport companies.

Onde Verte is the name of the tariff community in the Canton of Neuch√¢tel and parts of the bordering Canton of Jura and the Bernese Jura region. Five transport companies serve the 13 zones of the community.

"Ostwind is the largest tariff community in Switzerland in geographical terms. It is a product of collaboration between the Cantons of Appenzell Ausserrhoden, Appenzell Innerrhoden, St. Gallen, Glarus, Thurgau and 26 participating transportation companies. The length of its network is 3000 km.
The tariff community of LIEmobil includes all connections for the local public transportation in Liechtenstein."

The tariff community Passepartout is a coalition of the transportion community of Lucerne, the cantons Obwalden and Nidwalden and eleven further transportation companies. Its purpose is an integrated tariff system.

"The Rhaetian Railway connects the Canton of Graub√ºnden and fascinates customers from all over the world. The RhB lines are meter gauge wide and have a total length of 384 km. It is one of the four transport companies in Engadin Mobil, the tariff community of the Upper Engadin. Stadtbus Chur is the local public transport company of the City of Chur. It serves the network in and around Chur."

RVL is the tariff community in the district of L√∂rrach. 8 transport companies are affiliated to the community and create a dense network of rail, bus and tram lines. The tariff area is divided into 8 zones and borders on Switzerland (Basel) and France.

"As a major player in public transport, SNCF TER Nouvelle-Aquitaine transports 630,000 passengers a day throughout the Nouvelle-Aquitaine region thanks to our 700 daily trains. SNCF TER Nouvelle-Aquitaine guarantees an economical, reliable, sustainable and responsible journey and allows connections with long-distance trains."

liO is the regional transport network of the Occitanie Pyr√©n√©es-M√©diterran√©e region. It is also an economic and ecological policy in favor of mobility. Operated by SNCF Voyageurs, more than 550 trains serve 65,000 people daily in 14 different departments.
The STI network includes all connections of the STI Bus AG for the local public transport in the region of Thun.
Stadtwerke Aschaffenburg serves a network of approx. 110 km in the area of the city of Aschaffenburg and adjacent municipalities.

The tariff community of Northwestern Switzerland covers the cantons of Basel-Stadt and Basel-Landschaft, the Fricktal, Schwarzbubenland and the municipality of Ederswiler (JU). With the tram lines to Saint-Louis (FR) and Weil am Rhein (DE), international routes are also included in the tariff network, but they are not integrated into the usage perimeter of the General Abonnement and FAIRTIQ. The TNW was founded in 1987 as the first integrated tariff association and therefore played a pioneering role in Switzerland.

Four transportation companies are connected to the integrated tariff community Zug. It includes the whole Canton of Zug and adjacent areas. Boat lines on lake Zug and lake Aegeri are not part of the tariff community.
AUTO AG URI connects the Reuss valley in the canton of Uri. Two million passengers per year use the network of approximately 50 kilometers and 79 stops.

The Verkehrsgemeinschaft am Bayerischen Untermain serves the two districts of Aschaffenburg and Miltenberg, the town of Alzenau and the city of Aschaffenburg. In addition, the VAB tariff applies on individual lines as far as Mudau and Wertheim. With over 80 lines, VAB GmbH reaches around 380,000 residents in 65 towns and communities.

"Als Verkehrsunternehmen im RVF bietet die Freiburger Verkehrs AG (VAG) vernetzte und klimafreundliche Mobilit√§t in Freiburg an. Zugleich ist die VAG Ihr Ansprechpartner f√ºr den Kauf von digitalen RVF-Tickets und f√ºr RVF-Abonnements.
Der Regio-Verkehrsverbund Freiburg (RVF) ist ein Unternehmensverbund aus 18 Verkehrsunternehmen. Davon sind 15 Unternehmen per Gesellschaftsvertrag im RVF zusammengeschlossen, drei kommunale Verkehrsunternehmen erg√§nzen als assoziierte Mitglieder die Partner im Verbund. Gemeinsam betreiben sie den Nahverkehr f√ºr 660.000 Einwohner und die G√§ste in der Stadt Freiburg sowie in den Landkreisen Breisgau-Hochschwarzwald und Emmendingen. Rund 120 Mio. Fahrg√§sten nutzen den einfachen und g√ºnstigen RVF-Tarif j√§hrlich."

In the VBN, more than 30 municipal and private public rail and road transport companies are closely interlinked. The VBN region includes the independent cities of Bremen, Bremerhaven, Delmenhorst and Oldenburg and the districts of Ammerland, Diepholz, Oldenburg, Osterholz, Verden and Wesermarsch. In addition, the 9,400 km2 area with its approximately 2 million people includes some municipalities in the counties of Cuxhaven, Nienburg and Rotenburg (W√ºmme).

"The Verkehrsverbund Oberelbe (VVO) and the 12 transport companies cooperating with it offer modern local transport for residents and guests of the region.
In addition to the state capital Dresden, the transport association covers an area of around 4,800 km¬≤ and includes the districts of Meissen, Saxon Switzerland-East Ore Mountains and the western part of the district of Bautzen."
Verkehrsverbund Vorarlberg (VVV) is a company in the state of Vorarlberg. It was founded in 1991 and since the end of 1999 is listed as GmbH - as Verkehrsverbund Vorarlberg GmbH (VVV GmbH).

"Power. Traffic. Environment. We do it for you ‚Äî your WVV.
The WVV Group, as a municipal utility company, is the first point of contact in the region and regional market leader with its services. WVV is continuously developing and expanding marketable services. Market-driven quality is the success factor ‚Äî ensured by customer orientation, effectiveness and efficient processes. As an attractive employer, WVV creates a motivating working atmosphere and continuously develops its employees in line with requirements. WVV adapts to market changes with foresight and professionalism and translates them into business success.
As a mobility service provider, WVV stands for environmentally friendly transport for people in cities and regions by tram and bus. Investments in the route network and rolling stock ensure fast and reliable operation and a high level of passenger comfort. With the environmentally friendly tram, which is operated with green electricity, WVV makes an outstanding contribution to the avoidance of CO2 emissions in W√ºrzburg."

Four transportation companies are connected to the integrated tariff community Zug. It includes the whole Canton of Zug and adjacent areas. Boat lines on lake Zug and lake Aegeri are not part of the tariff community.

We are committed to continuously improve our service for you. To continue travelling with us, we ask you to please review and accept our updated conditions and declaration with the switches below. You can review this summary of changes to know more.

"I hereby revoke my consent for further data processing.
Note that this only affects the future use of your personal data.
Revoking your consent will result in losing access to this product and a new registration would be required to use it again."
Add an accepted payment method in this region
You cannot edit your settings while traveling.
The information required to show the ticket is not available offline.
Activate to continue to the next step.
"Looks like you're not travelling anymore. Your journey will be automatically stopped in:"
We have your back ‚Äî your journey was stopped. Please start a new journey before traveling again.
It seems like you forgot to end your journey. Cancel the Smart Stop countdown now if you want to resume traveling.
"Smart Stop needs permission to send you a notification as soon as we detect that you're no longer on public transport."

"Thanks to Smart Stop, the FAIRTIQ app notices when you are no longer traveling by public transport but have not ended your journey.
If this is the case, Smart Stop starts a countdown and sends you a message. You then have the choice of ending or continuing your trip. If you forget to end your journey, Smart Stop will do it for you after a certain time (approx. 20‚Äì90 minutes). Please note that it is not possible to change this setting during an active journey."
Slide the toggle button from left to right before boarding.
There is no station near your current location.
You may find yourself near several stations. You can select your starting point below.
Slide the toggle button from right to left after leaving the vehicle at your final destination.
I do not hold a SwissPass
By linking your SwissPass, you will not have to show it at ticket inspection, unless you are asked to do so by the control staff in certain circumstances.
Linked passes can only be edited via SBB.
Find your SwissPass number next to your picture at the bottom of your card.
Your first name, last name and date of birth in your FAIRTIQ account must match those on your card.
Tap the ticket symbol to display your ticket to the conductor.
Make sure to check your ticket settings before travelling.
First class tickets are issued only if first class is available.
In case of a control, you will be asked to show your SwissPass (half-fare) or proof that you are allowed to travel half-fare.

For the night network in the greater region of Z√ºrich the night supplement will automatically be issued with your ticket. Disable this setting only if you obtain your night supplements via a different channel.
Enter up to 3 pre-purchased travel passes or cards. They will be taken into account when determining the price of your journeys.
If you have a Half Fare Travelcard, define it by adding a pass/card. If you are under 16, the tariff will be adjusted automatically.
Before starting a journey, make sure you select the desired ticket settings.
You requested too many verification codes. Please retry in a couple of minutes.
Looks like you have an ongoing journey on another device. Please, stop the journey in order to start a new one on this device.
The journey ongoing elsewhere could not be stopped.
Your location must be available in high accuracy mode. Without this setting your journey will be automatically ended in 60 seconds.
"FAIRTIQ doesn't have access to your location anymore, your journey will be automatically ended in 60 seconds."
We haven‚Äôt charged you for any journeys yet.
